name: Teeny Ceety
description:
A free-form sandbox to play around in. There's no win condition, but you could lose if you spend all your money.

Controls:

Arrow/WASD keys navigates

Space changes camera angles

Enter goes into placement mode.

Esc bails back to navigation.

Buildings:

Apartment: Supplies 6 people, uses up a little cash sporadically.

Factory: Needs 2 people, produces a little money continuously

Office: Needs 3 people, produces a larger amount of money infrequently.

Park: Lowers the recurring costs of apartments.

Bridge: Not implemented

Caveats:

This was my first attempt ever using Unity. Not bad for a couple of days' all-nighters.
